The claim was debunked by an expert from: NOAA) who stated that it is not possible for a tornado to carry a mobile home for over 130 miles. The expert explained that tornadoes typically last less than 10 minutes and travel an average of 3.5 miles.
The story originated from a website call: dailynative.us) which is known for posting fabricated stories. The same story had also been posted on a satirical website called worldnewsdailyreport.com back in 2015.
The lack of an: About Us" page on dailynative.us raises suspicion about the credibility and purpose of the website.
Some readers noticed allusions to The Wi: suggesting that it might be a fictional tale.
